discover.instruction: Read about how things are made. Notice the verb forms.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о том, как делаются вещи. Обрати внимание на формы глаголов.

content.text: How <highlight>is</highlight> chocolate <highlight>made</highlight>? First, cocoa beans <highlight>are harvested</highlight> in tropical countries. The beans <highlight>are dried</highlight> in the sun. Then they <highlight>are shipped</highlight> to factories. The beans <highlight>are roasted</highlight> and <highlight>are ground</highlight> into a paste. Sugar and milk <highlight>are added</highlight>. The mixture <highlight>is heated</highlight> and <highlight>is poured</highlight> into molds. The chocolate <highlight>is cooled</highlight> and <highlight>is packaged</highlight>. It <highlight>is sold</highlight> in stores around the world. Millions of chocolate bars <highlight>are eaten</highlight> every day!
content.question: Who does these actions? Is it important to know?
content.question_ru: Кто выполняет эти действия? Важно ли это знать?

theory.title: Present Simple Passive
theory.title_ru: Настоящее простое время в страдательном залоге

points.example: The car is washed. The letters are sent.

points.rule: Use: Focus on action or result, not who does it
points.rule_ru: Использование: Фокус на действии или результате, а не на том, кто делает
points.example: English is spoken here. (doesn't matter who)

points.rule: Use: When doer is unknown, obvious, or unimportant
points.rule_ru: Использование: Когда исполнитель неизвестен, очевиден или неважен
points.example: My bike was stolen. (I don't know who)

points.rule: By + agent: Add if the doer is important
points.rule_ru: By + исполнитель: Добавляем, если важно кто делает
points.example: This book is written by J.K. Rowling.
They make cars. → Cars are made (by them).

notice.instruction: Find all passive verbs. Why is passive used instead of active?
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все глаголы в пассиве. Почему используется пассив вместо актива?

tasks.text: Welcome to our factory tour! This facility was built in 1995. Today, 500 workers are employed here. Every day, thousands of products are manufactured. First, raw materials are delivered by trucks. Then they are processed by machines. Quality is checked at every stage. Products that don't pass inspection are rejected. Final products are packaged and are stored in the warehouse. They are shipped to stores worldwide. Our products are sold in 50 countries!

produce.instruction: Describe how something is made or how a process works.
produce.instruction_ru: Опиши, как что-то делается или как работает какой-то процесс.
prompts: How is your favorite food prepared?
What processes are followed at your workplace/school?
produce.example: Let me tell you how paper is made. First, trees are cut down in forests. The wood is transported to paper mills. At the mill, the wood is cut into small chips. The chips are mixed with water and chemicals. This mixture is heated and is turned into pulp. The pulp is cleaned and is bleached. Then it is pressed into thin sheets. The sheets are dried and are rolled. Finally, the paper is cut and is packaged. It is shipped to stores where it is sold.
criteria: Describes a process or how something is made

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with Present Simple Passive.

texts.title: How Coffee Is Made
texts.content: Coffee is loved by millions of people worldwide. But how is it made? Coffee beans are grown in tropical countries. They are harvested by hand. The beans are dried in the sun. Then they are roasted at high temperatures. The roasted beans are ground into powder. Hot water is added, and the coffee is brewed. Sugar and milk are often added. Coffee is enjoyed at any time of day!

texts.title: News Report
texts.content: Today's news: A new hospital is being opened in the city center. 500 patients are expected to be treated here daily. The hospital is equipped with the latest technology. Over 200 doctors and nurses are employed. Free parking is provided for visitors. The building is designed to be eco-friendly - solar panels are installed on the roof. The hospital is funded by the government. It is considered one of the best in the country.

texts.title: Language Facts
texts.content: English is spoken as a first language by about 400 million people. It is used as a second language by over a billion more. English is taught in schools around the world. It is considered the language of business and science. Many scientific papers are written in English. International meetings are often conducted in English. The language is influenced by many other languages. New words are added to dictionaries every year.

texts.title: Restaurant Kitchen
texts.content: Welcome to our kitchen! Everything here is prepared fresh daily. Vegetables are washed and cut each morning. Meat is stored at the correct temperature. Each dish is cooked to order. Our pasta is made by hand. Pizzas are baked in a wood-fired oven. All ingredients are sourced from local farms. Tables are set before opening. Orders are taken by our friendly staff. Customer satisfaction is guaranteed!

texts.title: Environmental Report
texts.content: Millions of tons of plastic are produced every year. Much of it is thrown away after one use. Only 9% of plastic is recycled globally. The rest is dumped in landfills or oceans. Sea animals are harmed by plastic waste. Action is needed now! Reusable bags are encouraged in many countries. Plastic straws are banned in some places. More recycling facilities are being built. The environment must be protected for future generations.
